channel.title: I made a server and i can connect but when my friend tries he cant
channel.description: I made a server and i can connect but when my friend tries it just stays at connecting to update server. My server is a 508 Please help me fix this it would be much appreciated. :)

item.title: I made a server and i can connect but when my friend tries he cant
item.dc:creator: @nz_lols nz lols
item.description:
@nz_lols wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:3, topic:305005”][quote author=nz lols link=topic=401272.msg2974003#msg2974003 date=1254134296]
I made a server and i can connect but when my friend tries it just stays at connecting to update server.
My server is a 508
Please help me fix this it would be much appreciated.
[/quote]
Ok I assume this is your first time making a server so you need to set up a no-ip and foward your port (43594) i advise you start off with a 317 if you are new to coding servers.
If however you know what you are doing and you have the server set up and all but no1 can get on then you may need titan cache…
You can get this by searching titan cache download on google.
You need this for other ppl to connect to 508’s[/quote]
Thank you heaps ill try that now

Read full topic
item.source: I made a server and i can connect but when my friend tries he cant

item.title: I made a server and i can connect but when my friend tries he cant
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“nz lols, post:1, topic:305005”]I made a server and i can connect but when my friend tries it just stays at connecting to update server.
My server is a 508
Please help me fix this it would be much appreciated. :)[/quote]
Ok I assume this is your first time making a server so you need to set up a no-ip and foward your port (43594) i advise you start off with a 317 if you are new to coding servers.
If however you know what you are doing and you have the server set up and all but no1 can get on then you may need titan cache…
You can get this by searching titan cache download on google.
You need this for other ppl to connect to 508’s

Read full topic
